examples.example: 当我遇到新朋友时，总会微笑着说“你好”，开启一段美好的友谊。

translate.english: When I meet new friends, I always smile and say "Hello" to start a beautiful friendship.

examples.example: 走在路上，我热情地和每一位遇到的人打招呼说“你好”，心情格外舒畅。

translate.english: Walking on the road, I greeted every person I met enthusiastically and said "Hello", and I felt extremely comfortable.

examples.example: 每天早上我都会跟邻居说一声“你好”，让一天都充满阳光和温暖。

translate.english: Every morning I will say "Hello" to the neighbor, making the whole day full of sunshine and warmth.
